content: colourful stripes reverberate and radiate to create a gradual colour block effect in these simple socks knit from the top down these socks use our colour-coordinated 100 yard ~91m mini-skeins of sock yarn to produce the stripes or use sock yarn leftovers to make your own combination sample shown in glitterati party of five mini-skein set 1 in honey fig discontinued 1 http //shop sweetgeorgiayarns com/products/party-of-five-mini-skein-sets
